>>> header_range
bytes=50-

<<< http_headers
HTTP/1.1 416 Requested Range Not Satisfiable
Content-Length: 0
Content-Range: bytes */40
Content-Type: text/html; charset=utf-8

<<< http_body

<<< all_body

<<< END
